DOC.brief_title: A Single-Dose Pilot Study Radiolabeled Amatuximab ( MORAb-009 ) Mesothelin Over Expressing Cancers
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective determine biodistribution radiolabeled amatuximab tumor nontumor tissue subject mesothelin over-expressing cancer include mesothelioma , pancreatic , ovarian , non small cell lung cancer . This single-center , single-dose , open-label , pilot study amatuximab approximately 20 subject mesothelin express tumor . 111Indium-radiolabeled amatuximab ( 5 mCi ) administer . Serial SPECT imaging ( 3 specific time point 196 hour cold infusion ) perform determine binding tumor nontumor tissue . Subjects observe closely safety possible development anti-amatuximab antibody . Pharmacokinetics radiolabeled antibody determine imaging time .
DOC.criteria: Female Male subject > = 18 year age Histologically confirm mesothelinexpressing cancer Measurable disease progress prior therapy include nonhepatic lesion image > = 1.5cm , define RECIST v1.1 disease location , discretion physician , evaluable clinical symptom support biomarker , radiological pathological study conduct within 4 week prior study entry Known allergy hypersensitivity monoclonal antibody Known develop HACA Prior treatment amatuximab Prior treatment SS1 ( dsFv ) PE38 ( ss1P ) Prior treatment another test article within previous 30 day Known brain metastasis Known prosthetic device would prohibit image ow lesion interest due radiographic artifact Chemotherapy , biological therapy , radiation therapy immunotherapy within 3 week prior dose amatuximab
